statements: DELETE FROM student_report WHERE attendance_status = 'Absent' AND engagement_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE is_present = FALSE;
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE performance_score < 70 AND performance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM student_attendance WHERE is_present = FALSE AND attendance_date > '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE exam_score = 80 AND attendance_score = 90;
DELETE FROM engagement WHERE engagement_id = 100 AND student_id = 5;
DELETE FROM attendance WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND class_id = 'a48b5256-4819-46d1-8d3a-b9f925652124';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE class_id = 'a48b5256-4819-46d1-8d3a-b9f925652124' AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
